welcome: 👋 Hello! You can search videos using a code.
help_text: 🆘 To use the bot, send a valid video code or click /code.
admin_contact: 📞 For any issue or question, contact admin:
enter_code: 🔎 Enter the code to find the video:
send_feedback: ✍️ Send us your feedback or complaint:
video_not_found: 😕 Sorry, no video found for this code.
subscribe_first: ❗️ Please subscribe to the following channels:
video_ready: 📽 The video is available at this link. Feel free to watch ☺
privacy_text:
🔒 This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data while using this Telegram bot.

By using this bot, you agree to the policy.

📌 Data we collect:
- Telegram user ID
- Selected language

❌ No cookies are used.
✅ Only public media data is fetched.

🛡 Chat history is not stored. Links sent by the bot are completely safe.
